title: When I gank a lane twice and they say "camp more"

replies.body: This salty boy comment gets me every time. It's like yeah, I wanna win. If it's working, I will keep playing well and doing it?

Yoooou need to submit an idea to Rito for me, good Sparkle!

We need a Role Ward. It would be a ward that changed its appearance based on what role you were assigned to on Summoner's Rift!

Top lane - Island Ward
Jungle - Tent Ward
Mid - Fiesta Ward
Bot - Crit Ward
Support - Cradle Ward

Am I the only one that thinks its incredibly rude to hijack a comment just to pitch an idea at Riot?  (also so you know they actively chose to ignore your idea?)

They commented on someones post on the boards to add input into the discussion, not to have ideas spammed at them in every thread. 

Make your own and if enough people like it the people at Riot will see it for sure.

It was because this thread caused the idea that I posted it here.

You wanna ride that high horse, go find someone you can trick into thinking that your opinion matters.

Now why does _**your**_ opinion matter?

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

Not once did I say my opinion mattered.

So, y'know. Read next time.
Saying someone else's opinion doesnt matter is pretty much the same thing.
No, it is not.
It really, really does, its called implication.
Just because you say a thing doesn't make it true.
Except if you werent trying to imply your opinion mattered ud have said noones opinion mattered.

Except at that point, I hadn't voiced an opinion.

But please, continue.

>You wanna ride that high horse

Thats an opinion.
http://www.quotehd.com/imagequotes/authors1/marcus-aurelius-soldier-everything-we-hear-is-an-opinion-not-a-fact.jpg

He didnt dismiss what you said, he stated his opinion that you shouldve made your own thread.
You stated your opinion that he was on a high horse while doing the exact same thing he did, but acting like you werent.
If he was disdainful in his opinion so were you.
It's somewhat a paradox. "Your opinion does not matter and that is my opinion" If only it was "nobody's opinion matters"

Except I never said my opinion mattered.

But by all means, continue to say things about me that apply more to you. I wish you....a LOT of luck in the future, seems like you'll need it.

*can foresee my entire future through one post on the boards

I can see you watch rick and morty

I can see you're quick to mock someone when you think they did something they did not do, and I can see you're quick to interpret things your way.

That's plenty enough to have an idea of how life's going to treat you.
You mocked him first, he responded in kind- if that means he has a bad future, then what does that say for you?

No, no he did not. He is a third party who felt the need to jump into something he wasn't involved in so he could fail at mocking someone.

Seriously, does nobody read? Look at the _names._

Fine, let me adjust my sentence-
You mocked someone else first, someone else responded in kind- if that means he has a bad future, then what does that say for you?

Again, no.

He came in specifically targeting me, annoyed at one of my actions. I responded, annoyed by his actions. It is reprisal. I just responded bluntly, as opposed to the original "oh doesn't anyone else just hate stuff like WHAT THIS GUY DID" passive aggressive BS.

Ok one you dont seem to under stand what passive aggressive is

Two he came in annoyed at you mocking someone, mocked you, you mocked him back, he pointed out the stupidity of your response, then you played the victim card.
Except we're not talking about the original response.  Youre the one not keeping up if you thought we were.
Ultimate Ward Skin

Oh! Riot Maple actually has a topic where you can submit ideas like that right now, here: 

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/aG96Psz9-featureqol-changeidea-generator-for-2018-and-beyond
Thanks sparkles{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

> [{quoted}](name=SuperLuigiLXIV,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Qw0NEllK,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-12-19T20:41:44.275+0000)
>
> Yoooou need to submit an idea to Rito for me, good Sparkle!
> 
> We need a Role Ward. It would be a ward that changed its appearance based on what role you were assigned to on Summoner's Rift!
> 
> Top lane - Island Ward
> Jungle - Tent Ward
> Mid - Fiesta Ward
> Bot - Crit Ward
> Support - Cradle Ward

The adc ward should just be nothing because they refuse to ward even if you're playing against a blitz and a sion botlane
I think the support ward should be a ward ward skin.
I actually say "Yes sir" and dive that guy over and over rofl

And for those of us that get camped often (I'm an ADC main), I ask "What color tent you want?", then start counting in team chat how many times I get ganked, that way my team understands why their bot lane is loosing. I think the highest I've gotten to is 7.

is that all? ive had 32

yeah it was not a good zoe game for the first 20 mins
That's not a gank, that's just a duo lane at that point.
When you gank every other lane twice and go bot twice because it's constantly shoved up and they you're camping
"If you keep making it that easy, I probably will."

_I love the young people..._

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6SxjBWJPf78
solid 20/20 meme

There's this thing called wards.

It'd help watch for the tents ;)
The whiff of roasting marshmallows usually tips me off. But wards work too I guess.

Mmm... marshmallows...

{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

Actually I'm the type of people who uses that line , 2 ganks in 10 minutes is ok , but mate .... 2 ganks in 1 minute is sick , I'm trying to learn {{champion:92}} lately and to try to carry with her especially in this botlane meta , but I get camped just because I have the dawnbringer skin which I got from the early sales xD so they think I'm  {{champion:92}} main or smurf and camp in every single match I played her , that's just not fun , it's a normal match after all even if he wants to win , at least camp bot and stop saying report bot for feeding while you are camping your {{champion:17}} who just spams mastery 7 and doesn't help the team...
I played a match , the enemy had {{champion:67}}  Top, and {{champion:81}} , I was almost under tower but , they dived me , and died , used {{summoner:12}} , came back to lane , tried to ward and {{champion:81}} again ... killed me with his top laner , now no {{summoner:12}} and our jungler didn't even bother protecting the tower , came to lane , I was 2 levels behind , {{champion:81}} showed and dived me , killed me and took the first tower , all that happened in 5 minutes , don't you think ... this iss just not ok ? yeah it was 3 ganks but , also yeah it's called camping , and it's a normal match!
what's worse is , the whole team be like " gg report riven "
also when I bought Nightbringer {{champion:157}} and played him once to learn how to play him ( to be specific , to learn how to counter him better since I main mages ) but I was against {{champion:61}} and the enemy {{champion:28}} camped , she literally stopped farming , only taking buffs and camp mid :( isn't that sick ? like 20 ganks in 20 minutes ... is fair ? I stopped farming and stayed under tower , Eve would just bait my wall with her flash charm and orianna will full combo me and Eve will dive me and run with her Ult ..
I wish if something can be done about camping

That's the curse of trying to play riven or yasuo. Eventually you learn to play around the ganks but people have a hard on for camping those champions. And until you get significantly better the 'report riven' comments are just gonna keep coming. That's what I found when I was playing her.

> [{quoted}](name=Automated Riven,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Qw0NEllK,comment-id=000e0000,timestamp=2017-12-20T15:58:09.803+0000)
>
> That's the curse of trying to play riven or yasuo. Eventually you learn to play around the ganks but people have a hard on for camping those champions. And until you get significantly better the 'report riven' comments are just gonna keep coming. That's what I found when I was playing her.

Ikr ! xD I just wanted not learn , not to main , but especially when I play {{champion:157}} , no mastery , even not feeding  , I get flamed for being a Yasuo main , while I'm barely level 3 mastery on him , once I had won my lane and bot were feeding , and bot lane in fights be like , CARRY THIS YOU FILTHY PIECE OF SHIT , YOU ARE A YASUO , I stopped playing him after that.
yeah , there is a curse
ugh I don't know how to use those boards

I play ADC a lot and you really can't peel zeds/rivens/yasuos off at all. The only way to not get styled on is to stomp their faces into a concrete curb early game and hope they get the message to screw off. You can also buy a zhonyas as an ADC, but you get reported for doing that.

{{champion:89}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:86}}  and basically any other champion that basically has to go all in to be able to do anything are good gank targets as they are likely to eventually go in to trade with their opponent unless they are behind or something and if the jungler is around and ready to gank at that time they are pretty screwed most of the time
